title: Guess what Ronaldinho said about Afridi ahead of Pakistan visit
text:
Guess what Ronaldinho said about Afridi ahead of Pakistan visit | 0 0 
KARACHI: For many in Pakistan, this is like a dream coming true. Ronaldinho Gaucho is coming to Pakistan, and he is not coming alone, as several other top footballers from around the world would be accompanying Brazilian Football legend. 
Last Sunday, Ronaldinho released a short video on his Twitter profile, in which he announced “Pakistan, I am coming,” while carrying Pakistan’s national flag. 
Ever since Geo broke the story of Ronaldinho’s arrival to Pakistan, every sports-related person in the country seems to be talking about the legend from Brazil, who has two FIFA player of the year awards to his credit. 
However, there is one Pakistan sports celebrity, about whom Ronaldinho is talking. And, he’s one and only Boom Boom Shahid Afridi. 
The 2002 World Cup winner tweeted in Portuguese on Wednesday “Feliz pelas palavras Shahid Afridi BOOM BOOM herói de críquete do Paquistão. Aguardo c grande expectativa minha visita ao Paquistão em julho,” 
The literal English translation of Ronaldinho’s tweet read as "Happy by the words (of) Shahid Afridi BOOM BOOM cricket hero from Pakistan. I look forward to my visit to Pakistan in July." 
Shahid Afridi immediately responded on Twitter, saying that he’s waiting to welcome the legend footballer in Pakistan and looking forward to brief him about his charity work as well. 
“@10Ronaldinho Awaiting ur arrival brazilian superstar and (football legend. Will be a pleasure to show u my (Pakistan). #HopeNotOut” Tweeted Shahid Afridi, while responding to Ronaldinho’s post. Feliz pelas palavras Shahid Afridi BOOM BOOM herói de críquete do Paquistão. Aguardo c grande expectativa minha visita ao Paquistão em julho — Ronaldinho Gaúcho (@10Ronaldinho) March 15, 2017 
Ronaldinho is invited to Pakistan by UK-based Leisure Leagues for an exhibition 7-a-side match between Pakistan and rest of world.
